channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines

item.title: Trump admin updates: Hegseth says he did not see 2nd boat strike, survivors
item.description: Hegseth said he saw the first attack, but didn't "stick around" for the second.

item.title: Suspect in DC shooting of 2 National Guard members formally charged with murder
item.description: The suspect, Rahmanullah Lakanwal, appeared in court remotely from a hospital.

item.title: Mass killings in 2025 in the US hit the lowest level since 2006
item.description: Seventeen mass killings have occurred this year in the U.S., the lowest since 2006. Experts say this probably isn’t the start of a bigger trend.
